ygData.subject: Re: Trinity
ygData.msgSnippet: The blade slices into Deemos arm as it goes by, leaving a wide gash. Deemos: I do what I must to survive. You are a waste of a spark, as you will do nothing

From: "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@...>

The blade slices into Deemos' arm as it goes by, leaving a wide gash.

Deemos: I do what I must to survive. You are a waste of a spark, as you will
do nothing but watch life's joys float past and never take advantage of
them.

Deemos aims his nail gun at Aerotaur's chest. He fires it once. Arrow
crawled slowly to his feet again. He aimed at Deemos but was shot down by
Airbomber.

Airbomber: You're mine, Arrow, mine, mine, all mine!

Airbomber approaches Arrow, who was lying on the ground...

----- Original Message -----
From: <Rudra656@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, May 25, 2001 8:06 PM
Subject: Re: Trinity


> ::Aerotaur::
>     "I didn't think I was that slow."  He winces in pain and looks up at
> Deemos.  "Get down here you pathetic waste of a spark!"  He launches
himself
> upward until he is just below and in front of Deemos.  He then throws his
> staff end over energy bladed end at him.
>
>
